title: Lovely 1911 Craftsman Home with Garden
posting_body: ['Looking for tenants who want a home to love, that is well loved.', 'Our children were raised here and we love this home.', 'Beautiful 1911 Craftsman bungalow, one of original turn of century farmhouses in area when it was all cow pastures and homes had hitching posts for their horses.', 'Still has original gum wood paneling, craftsman trim and built-ins, even an ice closet!', 'Wall-to-wall carpeting, free standing gas fireplace, modernized bathroom and kitchen with gas stove, refrigerator, marble counters, washer/dryer.', 'Deep partially landscaped yard with six fruit trees including pear, fig, loquat, lemon, and two apples.', 'Best microclimate in San Francisco makes it ideal for enjoying a cup of coffee from the deck or the front porch.', 'Private driveway.', "Easy access to public trannsportation, close to shops, restaurants, Alemany Farmer's Market, and John McLaren Park.", "Special move-in: First and last month's rent, plus security deposit and no rent increase the first year.", 'Available Saturday, August 13th, rent prorated this month.', 'OPEN HOUSE DATES: Friday through Sunday, August 5 - 7, 10am to 3pm.', 'If these dates/times do not fit your schedule, we will do our best to accommodate for a private viewing.', 'Contact Vidda Chan', 'show contact info', '.', 'No dogs due to negative experience with previous tenants.', 'No smoking, no drugs, or illegal activity.']
